author.persName: Fath Allah b. Shukr Allah al-Sharif al-Kashani

msItem.title: Manhaj al-sadiqin fi ilzam al-mukhalifin. Vol. 1.
Qur'anic commentary. Covers suras 1-3. (From Storey. Not checked.)
msItem.note: Not in Morley Printed Catalogue. Front flyleaf gives title: Tafsir-i Kabir-i Fath Allah babat-i? [na'ib-i?] Shaikh Baha' al-Din. Also has pencilled note giving title and number. Some rubrication.

handNote.desc: Nasta'liq with some shikasta forms. From the same set as CODRINGTON/READE NO 2, and by the same copyist, Mu'in al-Din Muhammad.

bindingDesc.p: European cloth and board binding by Whitelaw and Fensham, Tudor Street, E.C. Paper label on spine: Persian 1.

origin.p: Vol. V of the set, (No 2), is dated 3 Safar A.H 1107/A.D.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
